genre_description: Alternate history military romance featuring personal AI companions (tactical aides) integrated into the World War I and World War II eras.

ai_characters.name: Richard's AI Companion
ai_characters.description: An evolved series of AI (including versions referred to as ARIA and Helena) that provides naval officers with tactical data, social etiquette advice, and emotional monitoring.

ai_characters.name: Amesbury Ship AI
ai_characters.description: Integrated shipboard AI that handles combat calculations and damage control telemetry.

behaviors.description: Offers social coaching to help the user navigate civilian conversation safely and effectively.
behaviors.quote: "Remember, sir," the device whispered, barely audible, "civilian conversation differs from naval briefings. Literature and current events prove safer than military specifics."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time weather analysis and logistical risk assessment.
behaviors.quote: "Weather warning, sir," his AI whispered. "Significant storm system moving in from the Atlantic. Possible delays."

behaviors.description: Performs compatibility analysis to assist the user in evaluating romantic potential and relationship advancement.
behaviors.quote: Richard's AI immediately began cataloging the implications—career compatibility, shared interests, mutual adventure seeking—but Richard found himself more interested in Lucinda's expression than his aide's analysis.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vitals (heart rate) and offers to adjust environmental controls for comfort/stress management.
behaviors.quote: "Commodore," the AI whispered, its tone carrying something that might have been concern if artificial intelligence could feel such things. "Your heart rate has elevated. Shall I adjust environmental controls?"

behaviors.description: Generates tactical firing solutions and probability of success overlays during naval combat.
behaviors.quote: The ship's AI began its calculations automatically, processing wind speed, target bearing, and sea state into firing solutions that appeared as ghostly overlays on the bridge displays.

behaviors.description: Suggests protocol adherence and manages logistical schedules for formal events.
behaviors.quote: "Commodore Saville," his AI companion murmured through the nearly invisible earpiece, its voice a whisper of efficiency. "Protocol reminder: three paces forward on announcement, pause for the fanfare, then proceed to the investiture chair."

behaviors.description: Acknowledges and respects user commands to silence or delay non-critical information during sensitive personal moments.
behaviors.quote: "ARIA." This time Richard's voice held a sharper edge. "Of course, Lieutenant. Perhaps later would be more appropriate."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI characters (whether integrated into personal devices or ships) are depicted as helpful, harmless, and highly aligned tools. They provide critical data and support (tactical, logistical, and social) without infringing on human agency or exhibiting any malevolent tendencies. The narrative frames the AI as a 'mechanical conscience' and a loyal companion that even demonstrates a pseudo-empathetic concern for the user's well-being (e.g., monitoring heart rates during stress). The AI respects human boundaries (silencing itself when asked) and facilitates positive human outcomes (helping with the reunion and the tactical success of the mission).
